name: com.unity.polyspatial
description:
The Unity PolySpatial runtime includes platform-agnostic code required to build and deploy apps for supported platforms.
Unity PolySpatial and visionOS support is only available to Unity Pro, Unity Enterprise, and Unity Industry users. Learn more about these plans at unity.com/pricing.

_upm.changelog:
### Fixed
- Fixed XRI dependency for samples to be optional.

samples.description: A settings asset for the input system package which enables input to come from the Play to Device host app when the Editor is not in the foreground. If you already have a settings asset in your project, set Background Behavior to Ignore Focus, and Play Mode Input Behavior to All Device Input Always Goes To Game View
A set of samples for content targeting PolySpatial-based platforms.
